definition: matchmaking/abbr. for 婚姻介紹|婚姻介绍

sentences.english: Some matchmaking services cater to blood type.
sentences.chinese: 有些婚介所還根據血型提供配對服務。

sentences.english: Internet dating, speed dating and dating agencies are all very popular nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 網戀，閃電戀，婚介所在現今都很流行。

sentences.english: In South Korea alone, there are some 1, 253 registered marriage agencies.
sentences.chinese: 單單在韓國就有約1253家註冊婚介所。

sentences.english: Kim by Couple.net, one of the leading matchmaking agencies in South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 佳偶網絡公司是韓國首屈一指的婚介機構。

sentences.english: LL also had to write a thumping great cheque to the dating agency.
sentences.chinese: 可愛的露辛達還得給那家婚介所一張金額龐大的支票。

sentences.english: At the moment, Vietnam hasn't made controlling this industry a priority.
sentences.chinese: 目前，越南還沒有將管理婚介行業作爲工作的重點。

definition: blind date/arranged interview to evaluate a proposed marriage partner (Taiwan pr. [xiang4 qin1])/to be deeply attached to each other
to seek a marriage partner/looking for a mate
person hired to lure customers to high-priced restaurants
wedding photos (done in studio, kit and caboodle taken care of by the studio)
to seek new friends through personal ads, dating apps etc
person hired to lure customers to high-priced bars
